items.sentence: Tom was surprised to see Mary's car in the driveway.
You haven't told us anything we didn't already know.
The police found Tom's body floating in the harbour.
Tom said he thought that there was no need to hurry.
What time does the next train bound for Tokyo leave?
Tom and Mary clicked from the moment they first met.
I would like to leave this town and never come back.
I think it'd be better to ask Tom to do that for us.
Unfortunately, I don't have time for that right now.
Tom didn't plan on running into anyone that he knew.
